attributes.action: Create Specific ISA Investment for Renewable Energy Sources
attributes.additional_details: We call on the government to create special “out of the stock-market” ISA investment accounts specifically for the production of electricity from natural sources such as solar and wind energy, managed nationally by the government, where people can by choice make safe direct investments for the production of Green Energy in Britain; through which the investors would have returns of steady income by way of monthly or quarterly dividends.
